lead_paragraph: Defending champion Richard Gasquet remains on course to defend his Open Sud de France title after rallying to beat Dustin Brown of Germany 1-6, 6-4, 6-3 on Saturday, setting up an all-French final against veteran Paul-Henri Mathieu.

headline.print_headline: Gasquet Beats Brown to Set Up Montpellier Final vs. Mathieu
headline.main: Gasquet Beats Brown to Set Up Montpellier Final vs. Mathieu

snippet: Defending champion Richard Gasquet remains on course to defend his Open Sud de France title after rallying to beat Dustin Brown of Germany 1-6, 6-4, 6-3 on Saturday, setting up an all-French final against veteran Paul-Henri Mathieu....
